mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT no, email, password, last_name as lastName, first_name as firstName, type, birth, gender, email_receive as emailReceive, country, city, question, answer FROM Q_member WHERE email = #{ email }) mm, (SELECT COUNT(*) selectKeywords FROM q_select_keywords sk INNER JOIN q_member mm ON mm.no = sk.member_no WHERE mm.email = #{ email }) r
mapper.insert: insert into Q_member(no, email, password, last_name, first_name, birth, gender, email_receive, country, city, question, answer) values(#{no}, #{email}, #{password}, #{lastName},#{firstName}, to_date(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{gender}, #{emailReceive}, #{country}, #{city}, #{question}, #{answer})
